attributes.action: Cancel and void premiership football season
attributes.additional_details: Would like all premiership football cancelled and football season classed as void for rest off season as we all know Coronavirus is having big impact worldwide premiership football clubs have many supporters who come from all over the world which can only increase the risk, as we are aware at time off writing some Arsenal  staff are in self isolation this means many more people will have come into contact with these. As a regular supporter attending matches the health and safety is number 1 priority to all football supporters.
attributes.background: Due to Coronavirus cancel all football matches in premier  league and make season void
